name: woodead
description:
WOODEAD

WSAD ................. move

mouse.................. aim

mouse1............... shoot

mouse2............... precision stance (hold right  mouse to charge, then press left mouse to fire extra juicy shot)

While in "precision stance" by holding right mouse, you will power up your rifle and will kill anything that's in your crosshairs. Best to line em' up for maximum efficiency. Careful though, you will take a knee and won't be able to move. 

There is no endgame btw, just shooting in the dark till' you get bored and move on. It's okay, I'll allow it. Might work on it some more at some point, but for now, it is what it is. A little project made within 24 hour timeframe for Synty Studios game jam.
